name: Salt and Sails
description:
Salt and Sails is a naval combat style game where you control a ship.
You have to take control of the pirate ship's guns and protect it from the attacks of various marine life, including traps. Earn coins and upgrade your ship to stay afloat for as long as possible. Knippels, scissor cannons, bombs and battering rams - you have many different pumping options in your arsenal.
Tailwind, Captain!
